cast.name: 马科·奥拉尼耶 Marco Horanieh

introduction: A team of scientists gets physically paralyzed by a virus. One of them drinks the only remaining antidote and drives full-speed to make other antidotes before the virus becomes fatal for his colleagues. But on his way, he bumps into a beautiful woman with whom he starts making love passionately.Best Short Film" - Mediterranean Film Festival (Italie), 2016"Best Audience Award" - Erotic & Bizarre Art Film Festival (Espagne), 2017"Best Thriller" - FantaSci Short Film Festival (États-Unis), 2017"Special Jury Award" - Short to the Point International Short Film Festival (Roumanie), 2017"Best Film" & "Best Cinematographer" - Nida Short Film Festival (Lituanie), 2017
